trans-unit.source: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies an encrypted key.
Typically, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> no necesita ser utilizado, excepto cuando se crea un servicio de token de seguridad personalizado.

trans-unit.source: When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un servicio de token de seguridad devuelve un token de seguridad, el token de seguridad emitido contiene las referencias a los tokens de seguridad adjuntas y no adjuntas.

trans-unit.source: Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message.
trans-unit.target: Las referencias adjuntas hacen referencia a los tokens de seguridad que están contenidos dentro del encabezado de seguridad de un mensaje SOAP y las referencias no adjuntas son tokens de seguridad que no están incluidos dentro del encabezado de seguridad de un mensaje SOAP.

trans-unit.source: These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, estas referencias afirman la autenticidad del token de seguridad emitido.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> class to reference an encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Utilice la clase <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause> para hacer referencia a una clave cifrada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey%2A> method returns the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey%2A> devuelve la clave cifrada.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] accepts wrapped keys that are well formed with respect to the wire format.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] acepta claves encapsuladas que estén bien formadas con respecto al formato de conexión.

trans-unit.source: The key wrap algorithm specified on the wire is accepted and used.
trans-unit.target: Se acepta y se usa el algoritmo de encapsulado de claves especificado en la conexión.

trans-unit.source: It is not verified to be compatible with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite> specified by the endpoint.
trans-unit.target: No se comprueba que sea compatible con el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite> especificado por el extremo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> class.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains a key that is encrypted.
Sets the value that is returned from the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey" /> method.
The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod" /> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> class using the specified key that is encrypted and the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key.
Use the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Utilice las cadenas constantes estáticas de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> para especificar el algoritmo criptográfico para el parámetro `encryptionMethod`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="encryptionMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="encryptedKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="encryptedKey" /> is zero length.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains a key that is encrypted.
Sets the value that is returned from the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey" /> method.
The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod" /> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> class using the specified key that is encrypted, the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key, and a key identifier for the encrypting key.
Use the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Utilice las cadenas constantes estáticas de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> para especificar el algoritmo criptográfico para el parámetro `encryptionMethod`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="encryptionMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="encryptedKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="encryptedKey" /> is zero length.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains a key that is encrypted.
Sets the value that is returned from the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey" /> method.
The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod" /> property.
A user-readable name that is associated with the key specified in the <c>encryptedKey</c> parameter.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName" /> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> class using the specified key that is encrypted, the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key, a key identifier for the encrypting key and a user-readable name.
Use the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Utilice las cadenas constantes estáticas de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> para especificar el algoritmo criptográfico para el parámetro `encryptionMethod`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="encryptionMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="encryptedKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="encryptedKey" /> is zero length.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains a key that is encrypted.
Sets the value that is returned from the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey" /> method.
The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod" /> property.
A user-readable name that is associated with the key specified in the <c>encryptedKey</c> parameter.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName" /> property.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
Sets the value that is returned by the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce" /> method.
The size of the derived key.
Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength" /> property.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> class using the specified key that is encrypted, the cryptographic algorithm used to encrypt the key, a key identifier for the key and a user-readable name.
When the `derivationNonce` and `derivationLength` parameters are specified the implied derived key is used instead of the direct security key of the token.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se especifican los parámetros `derivationNonce` y `derivationLength`, la clave derivada implícita se utiliza en lugar de la clave de seguridad directa del token.

trans-unit.source: Use the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> to specify the cryptographic algorithm for the `encryptionMethod` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Utilice las cadenas constantes estáticas de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> para especificar el algoritmo criptográfico para el parámetro `encryptionMethod`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="encryptionMethod" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="encryptedKey" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="encryptedKey" /> is zero length.
Gets a user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.
A user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: Un nombre legible para el usuario que está asociado a la clave cifrada.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName%2A> property is serialized into XML, it is placed in the <`CarriedKeyName`> element.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName%2A> propiedad se serializa en XML, éste se sitúa en el <`CarriedKeyName`> elemento.

trans-unit.source: For encrypted keys, the <`CarriedKeyName`> element is an optional element that associates a user-readable name with a key value.
trans-unit.target: Para las claves cifradas, el <`CarriedKeyName`> es un elemento opcional que asocia un nombre legible para el usuario a un valor de clave.

trans-unit.source: This name can then be used to reference the key using the <`KeyName`> element within the <`KeyInfo`> element.
trans-unit.target: Este nombre, a continuación, puede utilizarse para hacer referencia a la clave mediante el <`KeyName`> elemento dentro de la <`KeyInfo`> elemento.

trans-unit.source: The same <`CarriedKeyName`> element value, unlike an ID value, can occur multiple times within a single document.
trans-unit.target: El mismo <`CarriedKeyName`> valor de elemento, a diferencia de un valor de identificador, puede aparecer varias veces en un solo documento.

trans-unit.source: The value of the key must be the same in all <`EncryptedKey`> elements identified with the same <`CarriedKeyName`> name within an XML document.
trans-unit.target: El valor de la clave debe ser el mismo en todas las <`EncryptedKey`> elementos identificados con el mismo <`CarriedKeyName`> nombre de un documento XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets a key identifier for the encrypting key.
A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> that represents the key identifier for the encrypting key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier" /> que representa el identificador clave para la clave de cifrado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: El algoritmo criptográfico que se utilizó para cifrar la clave.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod%2A> property is one of the static constant strings in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, el valor de la propiedad <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod%2A> es una de las cadenas constantes estáticas en la clase <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted key.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the encrypted key.
The array that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey%2A> method is a clone of the encrypted key.
trans-unit.target: La matriz que es devuelta por el método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey%2A> es un clon de la clave cifrada.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified object.
Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified key identifier clause.

<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause" /> and has the same encrypted key, encryption method and user-readable name as the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
<paramref name="keyIdentifierClause" /> is <see langword="null" />.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains a key that is encrypted.
The cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
A user-readable name that is associated with the encrypted key.
Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified encrypted key, encryption method and user-readable name.

<see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="encryptedKey" />, <paramref name="encryptionMethod" /> and <paramref name="carriedKeyName" /> parameters have the same values returned by the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.GetEncryptedKey" /> method and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.EncryptionMethod" /> and the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.CarriedKeyName" /> properties, respectively; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Returns a string that represents the current object.
The current object.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.ToString%2A> method returns a string that contains the encrypted key and the cryptographic algorithm that is used to encrypt the key.
trans-unit.target: El método <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.EncryptedKeyIdentifierClause.ToString%2A> devuelve una cadena que contiene la clave cifrada y el algoritmo criptográfico que se utilizan para cifrar la clave.
